title: why do i even have to verify the email?
body:
my phone just broke and get fix in 7/30 i cannot  even remember my email. and now i cant play league?
why?
plz tell me

replies.body:
Hey lawsd, 

When you launch League and are presented with the email verification pop up there's a link to "Change your email". You will not need a mobile device to verify an email. 

If you're still having problems playing league please reach out to player support and submit a ticket. 

You can find out more information about why this change here: 
https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-support/aAVJiLXh-mandatory-email-verification
